Adds an annotation to the input musica's variant table with length of each variant

Source: R/annotate_variants.R
annotate_variant_length.Rd

Adds an annotation to the input musica's variant table with length of each variant

Usage

annotate_variant_length(musica)

Arguments

musica

Input samples

Value

None

Examples

data(musica)
annotate_variant_length(musica)
musica
#> An object of class "musica"
